name: Bright Blood
description:
Note: The web version does not run so well -- download the game for better performance.

This is the first "real" game I finished. After a long period of on and off working I finally got to a point where the game works and feels complete. At the moment I cannot tell whether I will continue working on this project.

Features:

  • Short, challenging runs (less than 10 minutes)
  • 3 different jobs
  • 4 different weapons
  • 2 different maps
  • 12 different color palettes / gradients

The controls can be seen in-game.

The credits are listed in-game. If you see your copyright or trademark infringed, please contact AN00BIS@mail.de.
